HeadComp.title: Wati vs MSG91 | Compare Communication APIs & Messaging Platforms
HeadComp.description: Compare Wati and MSG91 to find the right communication platform for your business. Explore differences in pricing, features, ease of integration, and support to make an informed decision.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Wati
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and Wati are both popular platforms for WhatsApp-based business communication. While Wati focuses heavily on WhatsApp automation with tools like Flow Builder and chatbots, MSG91 offers a broader omnichannel approach with advanced segmentation, AI-driven journeys, and localized support—making it more versatile for businesses seeking multichannel engagement and scalability.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, on the other hand, is a comprehensive omnichannel communication solution, supporting SMS, email, WhatsApp, and more. It offers advanced features like AI-driven customer journeys, dynamic segmentation, and robust analytics, catering to businesses seeking scalability, flexibility, and cost-effective messaging solutions.

content.name: Wati
content.des: Wati is a WhatsApp-centric communication platform designed for businesses looking to automate WhatsApp interactions with features like Flow Builder, chatbots, and seamless integrations. It offers an easy-to-use interface and is ideal for SMEs focused on WhatsApp automation.

features.pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.multi_agent_support: Free agents till 3 users, extra charges for extra users
features.ai_chatbot_integration: No code chatbot, costlier as we go for complex bots
features.unlimited_bot_creation: Free trial allows 3 basic bots; more flows need a paid plan.
features.whatsapp_payments: WhatsApp Pay checkout in Catalog with Razorpay and PayU
features.whatsapp_catalogs: Supports WhatsApp catalog with easy integration and product sharing in chat.
features.integration_and_plugins: Wati’s free trial lacks third-party integrations; the Basic Plan allows 2, with more on pay-as-you-go.
features.otp_verification: Does not provide OTP verification as a built-in feature
features.otp_widget: Wati doesn’t offer a website OTP widget.
features.customer_support_quality: Support via WhatsApp and email only.
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Integrates with Meta Ads for Clicks, conversion tracking, and real-time insights.
